name: Dice Roller - Random Generator
description:
Need to roll some dice? Look no further, Dice Roller allows you to roll one, two, three or five dice simultaneously randomly generating numbers from one to six.

To get the dice rolling, hit the roll button or you can even shake your phone to start the dice rolling.

Enjoy all your favourite board games with Dice Roller's clean design, download today.

- Roll one, two, three or five dice simultaneously
- Each dice will randomly generate a number from one to six
- Shake your phone to roll the dice or
- Press the button to roll

Have fun!
